Cuerpo: Date: Tue, 26 Nov 1996 00:17:26 GMT Server: NCSA/1.4.2 Content-type: text/html Last-modified: Mon, 19 Aug 1996 18:35:10 GMT Content-length: 1605 Alan Carle's Home Page Alan Carle Alan Carle received his B.A., M.S., and Ph.D. all from Rice University's Department of Computer Science. Afterwards he joined Rice as a Research Scientist. His research interests include compiling for parallel computers, automatic differentiation and its application to modeling and numerical optimization, interactive programming environment design and implementation, and programming language implementation. For contact info, finger carle@cs.rice.edu.
